solution_line_template: Janelle has {num_bags_blue} bags * {marbles_per_bag} blue marbles = <<{num_bags_blue}*{marbles_per_bag}={total_blue_marbles}>>{total_blue_marbles} marbles.

Janelle has a total of {initial_green_marbles} green marbles + {total_blue_marbles} blue marbles = <<{initial_green_marbles}+{total_blue_marbles}={total_marbles_before_gift}>>{total_marbles_before_gift} marbles.
Janelle gave away a gift of {gift_green_marbles} green + {gift_blue_marbles} blue marbles = <<{gift_green_marbles}+{gift_blue_marbles}={total_gift_marbles}>>{total_gift_marbles} marbles.
Janelle has a final amount of {total_marbles_before_gift} marbles - {total_gift_marbles} marbles = <<{total_marbles_before_gift}-{total_gift_marbles}={final_marbles}>>{final_marbles} marbles.
